This marks her third borrowing from KADET LTD to finance her business. She plans to use the loan to purchase more coconuts for resale. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children and repay her loan. 

She dreams of having a successful life and a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase more coconuts.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 45 years old and married with six children. With two children in school, Rosalina works very hard to provide for them. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy stocks of groceries to sell in her store.

She has been in this business for 4 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap and other groceries. In the future, Rosalina would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy stocks of groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es:
Marta, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, ya que ha instalado una vitrina con medicamentos en la clinica donde trabaja, ella necesita realizar compras periódicas de nuevos productos medicinales y vitaminas, ya que debe mantener medicamentos para cualquier enfermedad o simplemente vitaminas para fortalecer el organismo, los clientes de ella son los que atiende el medico con el que trabaja, aprovecha cuando este les receta algun medicamento.

Ella ha tenido buenos resultados de la inversión anterior,ya que mejoro el techo de la vivienda,y mejorar sus actividades cotidianas.
texts.en:
Marta has decided to take out a new loan, now that she has installed a display case with medications in the clinic where she works. She needs to make periodic purchases of new medicinal and vitamin products, as she must keep medicines on hand for any illness or simply vitamins for fortifying the body. Her clients are those attended by a doctor that Marta works closely with, so she is able to fill prescriptions that the doctor writes.

She has seen good results from the previous investment since she improved her living quarters' roof and improved her daily activities.

loans.use: to purchase medicines and vitamins.

loans.name: Maria Silbina

texts.es:
María, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para darle mantenimiento al negocio, este préstamo le servirá para comprarse una plancha industrial para hacer pupusas, esto le ayudara para mejorar el negocio y progresar poco a poco en el negocio.
María tuvo una buena experiencia con el préstamo anterior, su negocio se ha mantenido. Este es su segundo financiamiento.
texts.en:
Maria has decided to apply for a new loan in order to maintain her business. It will help her to buy an industrial grill to make pupusas (a Salvadoran snack), which in turn will help her to improve her business. 

Maria had a good experience with her previous loan - it helped her to keep her business running. This is her second loan.

loans.use: To buy an industrial grill.

loans.name: Daysi Romelia

texts.es:
Daysi, tiene la necesidad de fortalecer el negocio, para mantener los materiales necesarios para la costura, comprara hilos, telas, botones, con estos nuevos materiales espera mejorar eficiencia, elaborando más rápidamente las prendas de vestir.
Ella considera que con el préstamo anterior, pudo mejorar y que ha sido un gran apoyo para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Daysi needs to strengthen her business.  To have the materials that are necessary for sewing, she will buy thread, fabric, and buttons.  With these new materials she hopes to improve efficiency, making the articles of clothing more quickly.  

She considers that with the previous loan she managed to improve, and that it has been a great help for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy thread, cloth and bottons.

loans.name: Iris Noemy

texts.es:
Iris,  se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo préstamo,  para invertirlo en la compra cemento, ladrillo, hierro, laminas, esta inversión es para mejorar la vivienda, con ello estará en mejores condiciones con su familia, haciendo las reparaciones debidas.

Ella considera que las condiciones de ella y su familia han cambiado, mejorando y con la esperanza de seguir haciéndolo.  

Este es el segundo prestamo para Iris, el primero lo uso para fortalecer el negocio, el cual ya cancelo, ya que administra una tienda.
texts.en:
Iris has decided to apply for a new loan to invest in the purchase of cement, bricks, iron, and laminate. This investment is to improve her home. By making the needed repairs, she and her family will have better living conditions.

She feels her living conditions and those of her family have changed, improving and with the hope of continuing to improve.

This is the second loan for Iris. She used the first to strengthen her business, since she runs a store.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, iron, and laminate

loans.name: Leonila Aracely

texts.es:
Leonila, de nuevo solicita un segundo préstamo, para comprar un pedido de ropa americana como; camisas, blusas, carteras de esa forma mejorara sus ventas, puesto que tendrá variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes. 

El préstamo anterior le ayudo porque de sus ganancias logro darle el estudio a su hijo y contribuyo con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Leonila is currently requesting a second loan to purchase an order of American clothing such as shirts, blouses, and handbags, and in this way improve her sales by  having a variety of items to offer for sale to her customers.

Her earlier loan helped her because with her earnings she was able to pay for her child's education and contribute to the household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, blouses and handbags.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 23 years old. He is married to Lydiah. He sells disk movies and music disks. He has been in the business for the past year. He gets a monthly income of about KES 9,000 from his business.

This is his first loan term in KADET LTD. He will use the loan amount to purchase disks and CDs to sell in his business. His dream is to open another business in a bigger shop and sell wholesale.

loans.use: to purchase more disks and CDs to sell.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is a 48-year-old single mother with three children, aged 22, 17 and 15 years. She is in the business of selling scrap metals. She started one year ago and earns a monthly income of about KES 40,000. 

She has requested a loan of KES 30,000 to buy scrap metals for resale.  Her profit will help her pay fees for her children and support her family.

loans.use: To purchase scrap metals for resale.

loans.name: Yenis Maritza

texts.es:
Yenis, está interesada en un nuevo préstamo, para utilizarlo en el alquiler de un terreno para utilizarlo para la nueva siembra de maíz y frijol, con este préstamo podrá cubrir el gasto del alquiler e iniciar rápidamente los procesos de siembra.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a Yenis a comprar insumos agrícolas para los cultivos, gracias a Dios tuvo buenos resultados con buenas cosechas.
texts.en:
Yenis is interested in a new loan to use in paying for the rent on a plot of land that she will use to plant corn and beans. With this loan she will be able to cover the cost of the rent and quickly begin the planting processes.

Her previous loan helped Yenis to purchase agricultural supplies for her crops. Thanks to God she had good results with good harvests.

loans.use: to pay the for rent a plot of land to farm.

loans.name: Mabel Antonia

texts.es:
Mabel, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de materiales para hacer mejoras a la vivienda, ella comprara arena, cemento, hierro, estos materiales son para reparar un cuarto, ya que aun no está terminado.

Ella considera que el préstamo anterior fue muy productivo, ya que invirtió en el negocio, dándole mayor variedad de productos y mejorando las ventas.
texts.en:
Mabel is requesting a new loan to buy construction materials like sand, cement and iron rods to make improvements to her home. These materials will be used to repair a bedroom that is still unfinished. 

She believed the previous loan was very productive because she was able to invest it in her business, which provided her with a better variety of products and improved her sales.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and iron rods

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para su negocio, invirtiéndolo en ropa para vender como blusas, faldas, pantalones, esto le ayudara a surtirlo de nuevos estilos y mantener la preferencia de los clientes.
Su condición como comerciante ha mejorado, así lo considera Gerardo,  viviendo ahora mejor que antes junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Gerardo is requesting a new loan for his business to invest in clothing to sell, such as blouses, skirts, and pants.  This will help him stock up on new styles and continue to be his customers' preferred source of clothing.

He considers his circumstances as a salesman as having improved, and he and his family are living better now than before.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, and pants.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, con el propósito de que su negocio mantenga productos de calidad, en esta ocasión  comprara talcos, cremas, lociones, para ofrecer en el negocio, este préstamo le dará mejoras al negocio y para que sus ventas mejoren.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio, haciéndolo más fuerte y competente, aunque sus ultimos pagos fueron atrasados esto no le permite republicar su prestamo numero dos.
texts.en:
Ana has decided to request a new loan with the aim of maintaining quality products in her business.  This time, she will buy powders, creams, and lotions to sell in her business.  This loan will improve her business and increase her sales.

She believes her previous loan helped her improve the availability of her business, making it stronger and more competent, although her last payments were late.  This is why she is not allowed to republish her second loan.

loans.use: to buy powders, creams, and lotions.

loans.name: Maria Maura

texts.es:
Doña Maria tiene 49 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos entre 24 a 20 años de edad, los cuales ya son independientes, vive en al aldea La Jutosa, Choloma, Cortes.
La actividad económica a que se dedica Doña Maria es una pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios (arroz, frijoles, pan, churros, aguacates y cebolla). Inicio su negocio hace 4 años con un préstamo son odef. Posteriormente con las ganancias logro aumentar su inventario y cuenta con una clientela fija, lo que le permite un aumento en sus ventas y además la demanda de oferta de mas productos, atendiendo a sus clientes todo el día.
Ha obtenido ya varios préstamos con ODEF, los cuales le han seguido ayudando a mantener activo su negocio. Actualmente ha solicitado su préstamo numero ocho de 5,000 lempiras para invertir en la compra de granos básicos productos. (Harina, arroz, manteca, frijoles. Azúcar, condimentos, sal etc.).
Su sueño es aumentar las ventas y con las ganancias crecer económicamente y lograr un negocio estable.
texts.en:
Maria is 49 years old and is a single mother. She has four children between 20 and 24 years of age who are all independent. She lives in the village of La Jutosa, Choloma, Cortes. 

Maria makes a living with her corner store business where she sells food items (rice, beans, bread, churros, avocados, and onions). She began the business four years ago with a loan from ODEF. Later, with the profits she was able increase her inventory. She has a stable customer base which allows her to increase her sales. There is also a demand for more products. She attends to her customers all day. 

She has already received many loans from ODEF which have continued to help her keep her business active. Currently she is requesting her eighth loan for 5,000 lempiras to invest in purchasing basic food products (flour, rice, lard, beans, sugar, condiments, salt, etc.).

Her dream is to increase her sales and with the profits, grow financially and maintain a stable business.

loans.use: to buy basic goods (flour, rice, lard, beans, sugar, condiments, salt, etc.).

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana de 52 años de edad se dedica al comercio de mercancía variada mediante guías especializadas de productos; ella en su condición de mujer separada;  generó con su negocio ingresos para el bue desempeño de su hogar, conformado por sus tres hijos,  hoy en las edades de 22 a 33 años. Gradualmente ha logrado agregar diversos productos como artículos de aseo personal, perfumes, cremas, y vestuario en general. Su meta mas adelante es tener un punto comercial tipo almacén, donde venda variedades de mercancías, con las cuales sostenga una clientela al detalle y de contado. Su mayor desafío es su capital de trabajo, el cual resulta insuficiente para responder a su creciente clientela y esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará mercancías que vienen con descuentos en sus catálogos, y sobre la cual ya ha realizado la preventa. Así su inversión seria exitosa, porque sus clientes rentables están atentos a la llegada de vestidos, artículos para el hogar, que están con un buen precio en las revistas y que ellos obtendrían aun crédito muy fácil de pagar.
texts.en: Ana is 52 and sells various merchandise through specialized product guides.  She is separated.  Her business has generated income so her home, which is made up of her three children, can operate well.  Her children are between 22- and 33-years-old.  She has gradually succeeded in adding different products like toiletries, perfumes, creams, and clothing in general.  Her goal for the future is to have a place to sell her products like a department store, where she can sell various merchandise, with which she will sustain her retail clientele.  Her biggest challenge is working capital, which is insufficient to respond to her increasing clientele.  This is her reason for requesting a loan from Kiva.  This is her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and she will use it to buy merchandise that is discounted in her catalogs.  She has already made the pre-sale of these items, so her investment will be successful because her customers are attentive to the arrival of dresses and items for the home that are sold at a good price in magazines, and they would obtain credit very easily to pay for them.

loans.use: to buy dresses and items for the home at a discount.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair the engine of her minibus.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily, 22 years old, is from Kisumu City, along the the shore of Lake Victoria. She is married to Kennedy and they have two children, 6 and 7 years old.

For the last 5 years, Emily has operated a grocery, selling fruits and vegetables. She makes a monthly income of KES 6,000. Emily is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy oranges, mangoes, tomatoes, kale and bananas. Emily will channel her business to increasing her stock. Her dream is to have a big grocery.

loans.use: To buy mangoes, tomatoes and onions.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 33-year-old married woman blessed with five children aged between 3 and 12 years old.  She buys and sells ready-made school uniforms for resale at the Boya trading centre. She has operated her business for seven years, earning a monthly income of KES 8,000.

Rose wishes to use her first term loan of KES 19,500 from KADET LTD to purchase school uniforms for resale. She will use any profits to reinvest in the business and to repay the loan. Rose's dream is to improve in business and to raise her family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase school uniforms for resale

loans.name: Beda

texts.en: Beda is 51 years old and supports her two children, aged 16 and 12. She has been a dairy farmer for the past 10 years and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000. For her first loan, Beda has requested KES 20,000 to buy a milk cow. Profit from her business would help Beda repay her loan. Her dream is to one day become a large scale dairy farmer.

loans.use: To buy another milk cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, sugar and eggs.

loans.name: Heou

texts.en:
Mrs. Heou has been operating a fish selling business in a local market in the Baray district. She always gets up in the early morning to buy fresh fish in bulk from her suppliers, and then she sells them at retail in the marketplace. Heou generates an income of approximately $2 per day to meet her daily needs. Heou is married and has 2 children.

Heou will use her first loan from HKL and Kiva to buy bean seeds and 10 bags of fertilizer for both her bean crops and dry season rice crops. In the future, Heou aims to improve her family-owned businesses, especially rice husbandry.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Teymur

texts.en:
Teymur is 25 years old and single. He sells fruits such as pears, oranges, apples, pomegranates and bananas. Teymur has 4 years of experience in this field and has gained the necessary skills and knowledge required for his business. 

Fruits are very popular among Azerbaijan people and in high demand during the year. People like to eat fresh fruit and it is one of the main desserts for guests. Teymur's shop is located in the central bazaar and people always pass his shop and come to buy some fresh fruits. His father helps him to sell the fruits.  Teymur's monthly income from his business is 300 AZN. 

Teymur wants to expand his business. The amount of products he sells is not enough to cover the high demand. He would like to purchase more fruits and vegetables, increase his turnover and improve his family's life. He has therefore applied for a loan of 1,200 AZN. Teymur has a good client history and this will be his second loan.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables and increase turnover

loans.name: Oneyda María

texts.es:
La joven Oneyda María tiene su propia vivienda en el municipio de Santa Rosa del Peñón y actualmente está pasando dificultades ya que ha comenzado a tener malas condiciones en dicha vivienda por lo que tuvo la oportunidad a través de sus amistades de darse cuenta que Ceprodel apoyaba para este tipo de actividades.

Se presentó por primera vez para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción tales como cemento, arena, y zinc. Está consciente que Ceprodel apoya a este tipo de personas y espera que dicho crédito sea otorgado para así iniciar su obra de mejora de su vivienda que tanto lo requiere para beneficio propio y de la familia.
texts.en:
Young Oneyda María lives in her own house in the town of Santa Rosa del Peñon. She is currently in need of help as the conditions of her house have begun to worsen, and through her friend she had the chance to come to know that Ceprodel supported this kind of needs.

She has come to Ceprodel for the first time to ask for a loan she will use to buy construction materials such as cement, sand and zinc. She is aware of the fact that Ceprodel supports people like her, and she hopes this loan will be granted in order to start the improvement works on her house, something she greatly needs for her family’s benefit as well as her own.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand and zinc.

loans.name: Dinorah Del Carmen

texts.es:
Dinorah, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, ya que ha recibido buena atención, y tiene la necesidad de invertir en el negocio, ella comprara plátanos, yuca, aceite, para el negocio.
Ella considera que ha mejorado su condición, que estos préstamos le han permitido ir superándose y obtener mejores ingresos por sus ventas.
texts.en:
Dinorah decided to apply for a new loan, which was favorably granted. She needs to invest in her business and will buy plantains, cassava and oil for her food production.

She believes that her condition has improved and that these loans enabled her to be successful and earn a higher income from her sales.

loans.use: to buy plantains, cassava and oil for her food production.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi, 37 years old, is a single mother of two children aged 20 and 17. She has operated a green grocery store for two years. She earns a monthly income of KES 34,500 from her business.

This is Naomi's first loan with KADET LTD, which she will use to purchase cabbages and potatoes to sell. Naomi was introduced to KADET LTD by a client. Her dream is to manage to put up rental houses.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of cabbages and potatoes to sell

loans.name: Hajjat

texts.en:
Hajjat is 33 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala north region of Uganda. She is married and has 6 children, with 4 of them currently in school. For the past 6 years, Hajjat has been working hard to manage her retail shop, where she sells sugar and soap. 

To help expand her business, Hajjat has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more essential commodities, such as sugar, for resale, and will help Hajjat to generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children. Hajjat hopes that in the future she will be able to open up a wholesale shop. 

Hajjat is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP), which primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Hajjat who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more essential commodities, such as sugar, for resale,

loans.name: Raquilda

texts.es:
Raquilda, de 48 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Jorge con quien tuvo 5 hijos de los cuales solo vive con uno de ellos: Miguel a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Daniel Hernández. Su principal actividad durante la semana es la compra y venta de ovejas. Consiste en recopilar ovejas de los ganaderos, los que después vende a más precio en la feria ganadera que existe en las diferentes localidades de su ciudad. Viaja mucho, por eso es muy conocida en su zona. Ya los fines de semana, junto a su esposo se dedican a la venta de leña. Compran árboles y ellos mismo cortan la leña para comercializarlos a la ciudad de Huancayo, donde tienen clientes fijos. Cuenta que no tiene un ingreso fijo, ya que su capital varia de acuerdo al grosor de los árboles, depende de ellos los resultados. Paralelo a ese trabajo su esposo realiza el oficio de albañil, arreglando diferentes casas y construyendo otras. Todo depende del contrato que realice. Ahora desea incrementar su capital de trabajo para seguir produciendo más. Este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Raquilda de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más árboles para producir más leña.
texts.en:
Raquilda, who is 48 years old, is a hard-working woman. She lives with Jorge, with whom she had five children, of whom only one lives with them: Miguel, who takes care of them in their own house, located in the district of Daniel Hernández. Her main activity during the week is the purchase and sale of sheep. Her business consists of collecting sheep from the stock farmers, and later she sells them for a higher price at the livestock markets which exist in different locations in her city. She travels a lot, and so she is very well known in her area. On weekends, she and her husband sell firewood. They buy trees and they themselves cut the firewood to market it in the city of Huancayo, where they have regular customers. She tells us that she does not have a secure income, since her capital varies according to the size of the trees; her results depend on this. Alongside this work, her husband works as a mason, repairing various houses and building others. Everything depends on the contracts he makes. Now she wants to increase her working capital to continue producing more. This is her seventh loan with MFP, where she hopes for a small loan so that she can complete her objectives. On the other hand, she promises once more to make her payments. In addition, she is thankful to be part of her association (communal bank) because all its members are responsible and united.

Raquilda, on receiving her loan, will invest the money she has requested in the purchase of more trees to produce more firewood.

loans.use: to buy more trees for firewood

loans.name: Nasimi

texts.en:
Nasimi, 33 years old, is married and has two children. He has 3 years of experience in selling men's clothing. His wife actively helps him choose appropriate merchandise because she has good taste.

Nasimi chose this business because it is very profitable and he has gained permanent clients over the years. He is friendly, polite and always gives a discount. Nasimi says the secret of his success is his shop's location, on the central bazaar. Nasimi's monthly income is 230 AZN, which is not enough to cover his family's needs. He has applied for a loan of 800 AZN to expand his business. He will use this loan to purchase new merchandise and diversify. He has good credit history and this will be his second loan.

loans.use: to purchase more men's clothing and diversify

loans.name: Janneh

texts.en:
Janneh, 30 years old, lives in Jacob Town. She is married and has four children aged between 3 and 10 years old. They are all in school, except the younger one, and they all live at home.

For the past twelve years, Janneh has been selling candy, biscuits and pepper in her community. She started this business from her savings and she enjoys the independence. Janneh says that buying is sometimes slow. She is requesting a loan a to purchase more candy, biscuits and pepper for her business. Her plan is to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more candy, biscuits and pepper for her business

loans.name: Moises Adali

texts.es:
Moisés, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en medicamentos para el negocio, como la compra de vitaminas, productos medicinales, sueros, entre otros más que existen y que él necesita para mejorar su inventario.
Él considera que estos préstamos le han permitido mejorar en el negocio, que su inventario mantenga productos para todo tipo de enfermedad, además esto le ha ayudado tambien a mejorar la condición de su familia.
texts.en:
Moisés applies for a new loan to invest in medicine for his business. He will buy vitamins, sera and other available medical products which he needs to complete his inventory.

He believes that these loans enabled him to bolster his business, keep products for all kinds of diseases in inventory, and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, sera and medical products.

loans.name: El Rancho Progreso Group

texts.es:
La señora Sebastiana es casada, tiene 34 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educacion primaria, tiene 4 hijos los cuales estudian, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa para damas y caballeros, iniciando este negocio con poco capital y hasta el momento lleva 7 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería consistente en ropa, Suéteres, playeras, blusas, sudaderos, y entre otros. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio con mas capital. Las demás integrantes se dedican a la artesanía y al comercio.
texts.en:
Sebastiana is married and is 34 years old. She completed six years of primary school and has four children who are studying. She makes a living in the business of selling women's and men's clothing. She started this business with a little bit of capital and as of now, has seven years of experience. She also has the support of her husband who makes a living in the same line of work. 

She is organizing a group to be able to request a loan which she will use to buy merchandise consisting of clothing like sweaters, t-shirts, blouses, and sweat shirts among other things. In the future she hopes to have a business with more capital. The other members make their livings in handicrafts and sales.

loans.use: to buy clothing like sweaters, t-shirts, blouses, and sweat shirts among other things.

loans.name: Teopista

texts.en:
Teopista is 45 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala north region of Uganda. She is widowed and has 4 children, with 2 of them currently in school. For the past 10 years, Teopista has been working hard to manage her poultry farm, which sells chicken. 

To help expand her business, Teopista has requested a loan of 1,700,000 Ugandan Shillings (UGX) from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more poultry feed, and will help Teopista to generate greater profits and pay school fees for her children. Teopista hopes that in the future she will be able to expand her business. 

Teopista is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP), which primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Teopista who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more poultry feed

loans.name: Gaby

texts.es: Gaby, de 19 años, es una joven madre, quien desea un buen bienestar para su querida hija Magdiel de 01 año, a quien brinda mucho amor. Gaby, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos; ella ofrece sus catálogos a sus amigas y vecinas quienes mayormente hacen pedidos. Hace 01 año empezó a realizar esta actividad, pero desde que tuvo a su hija tuvo que esforzarse por seguir adelante. Sin embargo considera difícil el tener que caminar durante todo el día junto a su pequeña hija; pero aun así lo hace por obtener buenas ganancias. Asimismo, labora haciendo recargas a celulares en la cual le va muy bien. Para más adelante lo que prioriza es en comprar productos de cosméticos para luego vender a las personas que le piden. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP,  está dispuesta a pagar de forma puntual ya que mas adelante pueda acceder a otro préstamo. En su banco comunal es una  socia muy colaboradora. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, realizará sus compras de cosméticos.
texts.en:
Gaby, 19, is a young mother who wishes a healthy wellbeing for her dear one-year-old daughter Magdiel, on whom she dotes. Gaby earns a living selling cosmetics. She offers her catalogs to her friends and neighbors, most of whom place orders. She began this business a year ago, but since having her daughter she has had to push herself to get ahead. However she finds it difficult to have to walk around all day with her little girl, but even so she does it in order to make a good income. In addition she works selling cell phone minutes, which is going very well for her. The priority now is buying cosmetics products to sell to those who ask for them. 

This will be her first loan with MFP and she is prepared to pay on time so that she may have access to another loan in the future. In her communal bank she is very supportive of the other members. With the 1,000 Peruvian soles she will make purchases of cosmetics.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria Elvira

texts.es:
Doña Maria Elvira tiene 45 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos de 25, 22,15 y 9 años de edad,de los cuales 2 de ellos estudian, vive con su familia en la Colonia 9 de mayo, Cofradía, Cortes.
Doña Maria tiene seis años de tener este negocio de elaboración de tortillas de maíz. En su comunidad tiene establecido sus clientes. Ella trabaja muy duro desde las  8.30 de la mañana hasta las 7.00 pm. Este negocio es rentable ya que de allí ha podido aportar más ingresos para la ayuda de su hogar y logrado sacar sus hijos menores adelante.
Doña Maria ha solicitado varios préstamos con ODEF, ahora solicita su quinto préstamo de 10,000 lempiras  para poder invertir en la compra de maíz para la elaboración de tortillas.
Su meta es llegar hacer una microempresaria con mayor rentabilidad y tener una economía estable para seguir ayudando a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria Elvira is 45 years old, married, and has four children who are 25, 22, 15 and 9 years old. Two of them are studying. She lives with her family in the 9 de Mayo neighborhood of Cofradía, Cortes. 

Maria has had her business making tortillas for six years. She has established a customer base in her community. She works very hard from 8:30 in the morning to 7:00 PM. This is a profitable business as she has been able to contribute more income to help her family and has been able to get her younger children ahead. 

Maria has requested several loans from ODEF. Now she is requesting her fifth loan for 10,000 lempiras to be able to invest in the purchase of corn for making tortillas.

Her goal is to establish a more profitable small business and have a stable income to continue helping her children.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Genaro Deciderio

texts.es: El señor Genaro , es habitante del municipio de la Concepcion , junto a su familia , ellos son de origen Humilde , durante muchos años se han dedicado a la agricultura , la mayor afectacion que se le presenta son los desastres naturales , ya que de tanta lluvia ,casi todas las flores de café se cayeron y la producción fue muy baja , lo que él no cuenta en estos momentos con los recursos necesarios para sacar adelante este año la produccióm , el necesita  fertilizantes e insumos necesarios  para la compra de los suministros .
texts.en: Genaro lives in the municipality of La Concepcion with his family.  His family is of modest origins, and over many years they have been farmers.  The main challenge that he has faced has been the natural disasters, because with so much rain, almost all of the coffee flowers fell off and the production was very low.  At this time, he lacks the resources he needs to get started with this year's production.  He needs fertilizers and agricultural supplies.  This loan will be used to purchase supplies.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and agricultural supplies

loans.name: Bibizilol

texts.ru: Бибизилол более восьми лет занимается выращиванием овощей и бахчевых культур. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. Ее муж работает в ферме. Она берет кредит для закупа семян картошки, арбуза и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: For more than eight years Bibizilol has grown vegetables and melons.  She is 39 years old and married.   Her husband works on their farm.  She is taking out a loan to buy potato and watermelon seed and mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and seed

loans.name: Yessica

texts.es:
Yessica, de 26 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su esposo, Carlos, con quien se casó hace poco y juntos tienen un hijo, Kener de 10 años de edad, al que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en Pampa blanca. Se caracteriza por ser una mujer diferente, su trabajo consiste en el trasporte público, manejando un motocarro desde su anexo a la ciudad de Pampas, donde ella traslada a los pobladores del lugar. Según cuenta es muy admirada, pues es una de las pocas mujeres que desarrolla esta actividad. Además distribuye su tiempo con los trabajos eventuales que desarrolla en la gobernación de su localidad, como limpieza de jardines y veredas. Gusta de estar ocupada, por ello constantemente ayuda a su cuñada con el ordeño de sus vacas ahí puede obtener un poco de leche fresca para alimentar a su hijo, a quien quiere mucho. Por su parte su esposo trabaja como albañil en una empresa constructora de casa, donde recibe un sueldo mensual. Ahora su mayor sueño es vivir en Huancayo, una de las ciudades más grandes del país. Ya esta dando el primer paso para lograr sus sueños. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Yessica de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en completar sus ahorros para comprar un terreno propio en la ciudad de Huancayo.
texts.en:
Yessica, 26, is a hardworking woman. She lives with her husband, Carlos. They are recently married and have a 10-year-old son together, Kener, who they look after in their own house in the area of Pampa Blanca. Yessica describes herself as an individual and works in private transport, driving an auto-rickshaw from her neighbourhood to the city of Pampas, where she gives lifts to the people that live there. She says that she is very admired because she's one of the few women who do this work. She also spends her time carrying out various jobs for the local government, like cleaning up the gardens and pavements. She likes to keep busy, so she always helps her sister-in-law in looking after her cows, which means she can get a little bit of fresh milk for her son, which he loves.

For his part, her husband works as a bricklayer for a housebuilding company, which gives him a monthly wage. Now their biggest dream is to live in Huancayo, one of the largest cities in the country. They are already taking the first step to achieve this dream. This is Yessica's second credit with MFP; she is hoping for a small loan to help them achieve their goals, and she promises once again to keep up with her repayments. She is happy to be part of the association because all the members are responsible and supportive people. When she receives her loan, Yessica will put the money together with their savings to buy a plot of land in Huancayo.

loans.use: To buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 48 años es una mujer sabia. Hace 10 años se separó de su esposo. Desde entonces tuvo que cuidar de sus 4 hijos sola, actualmente vive con Jessica y Edith a los que cuida en una casa alquilada en el cerrito de la Libertad, Huancayo. Es conocida en su barrio, ya que durante 12 años deleitó a sus vecinos del rico caldo de gallina y cordero, que solo ella sabe preparar. En un espacio de su casa acondicionó un pequeño restaurante que solo se abre durante las noches, le agrada mucho su trabajo, pues asume su éxito al apoyo d sus hijos quienes son incondicionales para ella. La mayor de sus hijas estudia en la universidad, le enseñó a depender de si misma y salir adelante, “trabaja y apoya en casa”, afirma con orgullo. Por su parte su esposo le manda un pensión mensual que ayuda en algo a los gastos del hogar, pero como ella dice, “es muy poco”. No se desanima, con coraje y el carisma que la caracteriza sabe que logrará sus objetivos, pues quiere ver a sus hijos desarrollados. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “santa teresa” y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. María de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad y gaseosa para su restaurante.
texts.en:
María who is 48 years old is a wise woman. Ten years ago she separated from her husband. Since then she has taken care of her 4 children alone. Currently she lives with Jessica and Edith caring for them in a rented house on the hill of Libertad, Huancayo. She is known in her neighborhood because for 12 years she has delighted her neighbors with the delicious chicken and lamb soup that only she knows how to make.

She has fitted out a space at home for a little restaurant that only opens during the evenings. She likes her work a lot because she counts on its success to support her children who are unconditionally for her.

The oldest of her children is studying at university, learning to depend on herself to get ahead, “working and helping at home’, she says with pride. Her husband sends monthly alimony that helps with some of the household expenses, but as she says, “it is very little.” 

She is not discouraged, with the bravery and charisma that she is known for she achieves her goals, wanting to see her children grow up. 

She belongs to the solidarity group Santa Teresa and this is the 7th loan though MFP, where she hopes for a small loan so that she can fulfill her goals. And she promises once again to make her payments on time. Also, she likes being a part of her association because all of the members are trustworthy and united. María upon receiving your support will invest the requested money in the purchase of staple products and soft drinks for her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy staples and cases of soft drinks
